summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6661 for the improvement of S. Victor St. from 46th Ave. S. to Beacon Ave. S.; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers together with the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 104889, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
